contentencoded:
When you are huge, it's tough to escape the attention of regulators. Last week, Apple CEO Tim Cook faced questions about tax avoidance on Capitol Hill. Now, the European Commission is reportedly looking into whether Apple uses unfair tactics that hurt competition.

Marketplace's European editor Stephen Beard joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss the investigation and Europe's reaction.
description: The European Commission is looking into whether Apple uses unfair tactics that hurt competition, according to the Financial Times.
title: EU officials investigate Apple over sales tactics: Report
